snippet: The interior minister of the United Arab Emirates said the suspect had also planted a bomb on the doorstep of an Egyptian-American doctor.
abstract: United Arab Emirates authorities arrest woman they say disguised herself in black-veiled gown, fatally stabbed an American teacher and planted bomb outside home of Egyptian-American doctor; do not identify woman or give her nationality; say it is unclear whether she was motivated by Islamic State's calls to carry out solo attacks against its enemies.
lead_paragraph: The interior minister of the United Arab Emirates said the suspect had also planted a bomb on the doorstep of an Egyptian-American doctor.

headline.main: Suspect Is Held in Killing of American in Abu Dhabi
headline.print_headline: Suspect Is Held in Killing of American in Abu Dhabi

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
